alert.note: Alert for Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 8:21PM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with higher amounts above 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Raft River including Yale, Sweetzer Summit and Franklin/Eastern Oneida region including Malad and Preston. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Pockets of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Expect strong downslope winds in the I-84 corridor near Yale starting early morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Raft River Region
